item.title: EP 91 - World's Sexiest Seed: The Magic Of The Coco De Mer
item.itunes:title: World's Sexiest Seed: The Magic Of The Coco De Mer
item.description:
Today we examine the tragedy of Candance Newmaker, take a look at the film "The Conspiracy," then dive into the Indian Ocean to retrieve a magical coconut!

Patreon
https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!
https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

Candance Newmaker was only 10 when she underwent "Rebirthing Therapy." By the end of the day, she was dead. What was the point of such aggressive therapy and more importantly, why is it still practiced to this day?

Then we take a quick trip to Jason's Video Vault to check out one of my personal favorites: "The Conspiracy." Half found footage, half mockumentary, and all around great film!

Finally we take a voyage to the Indian Ocean, where a sexy coconut becomes a treasured item while also giving birth to rumors, myths, and legends.

Links:

The Tragic Tale Of Candace Newmaker, The Girl Who Died In A “Rebirthing” Treatment

https://allthatsinteresting.com/candace-newmaker

Candace Newmaker

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Candace_Newmaker

Attachment therapy

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Attachment_therapy

The Conspiracy Trailer

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=A_06vpcHzGk

Legends of the coco de mer

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legends_of_the_coco_de_mer

The secret of the world’s largest seed revealed

https://www.newscientist.com/article/dn26930-the-secret-of-the-worlds-largest-seed-revealed/

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black
Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"
Closing Song: "Bella Royale"
Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2021
